clinical_notes.text: Laura K. Johnson, 41 y.o. female, presents for routine exam. BP 122/78. BMI 26. No complaints. Family history: Mother diagnosed with breast cancer at age 54. Plan: counsel on preventive screenings. Patient declined mammogram today, states she will schedule next year.
CBC and BMP normal. Lipid panel: LDL 126. HDL 59. Fasting glucose 96. All other labs WNL.
Complaint: sore throat and mild fever. Diagnosed with strep throat. Treated with amoxicillin 500 mg PO BID x 10 days.
42 y.o. female. BP 124/80. BMI 27. Reports she has not yet had her mammogram done. Reminded again, referral provided. Encouraged patient to schedule within the year.
Complaint: seasonal allergies. Refilled loratadine 10 mg daily. No other concerns. Mammogram status remains not documented in EHR.
43 y.o. female. Weight: 163 lbs. Reports increased stress, poor sleep. No breast complaints. Mammogram reminder placed again, overdue since 2020 referral.
Instruction: Please schedule mammogram at Women's Imaging Center, call 555-222-8899.
Complaint: left ankle sprain after fall. Exam consistent with mild sprain. Treated with rest, ice, compression, elevation. Noted again no mammogram result in chart.
44 y.o. female. BP 126/82. BMI 27. Labs ordered. Mammogram discussed again; patient acknowledges but has not scheduled. Plan: follow-up in 1 year.
Fasting glucose 101 (borderline). LDL 132. HDL 58. Counseled diet and exercise.
Patient called to request refill for trazodone 50 mg at bedtime for insomnia. Reminded again mammogram is overdue. Patient agreed to consider scheduling.
45 y.o. female. Stable overall health. BMI 27. Mammogram overdue for >3 years now. Provider strongly recommended to schedule at next available opportunity.
Complaint: mild depression symptoms. PHQ-9 score 8. Started sertraline 50 mg daily. No acute safety concerns.

46 y.o. female. BP 124/80. BMI 26. Labs ordered. Mammogram still not documented despite multiple reminders across 3 years. Strongly advised to schedule. Family history of breast cancer increases urgency.
Fasting glucose 103. Lipids: LDL 129. HDL 62. Vitamin D borderline low at 28 ng/mL. Mammogram status remains missing in record.
